title: Medication CRUD Controller
description:
Implement Medication Management Controller

Create a comprehensive medication management controller that handles the complete lifecycle of medication orders, administration tracking, and reconciliation processes within the healthcare system.

Requirements:

Core Functionality:
- Implement endpoints for creating, updating, and canceling medication orders
- Track medication administration events with timestamps and administering staff information
- Support medication reconciliation workflows (admission, transfer, discharge)
- Handle both scheduled and PRN (as-needed) medication types
- Manage medication dosing schedules and frequencies

Data Validation & Safety:
- Validate medication orders against patient allergies and contraindications
- Enforce required fields: medication name, dose, route, frequency, prescriber
- Implement drug interaction checking if applicable
- Validate dosage ranges and administration routes
- Ensure proper authorization levels for order creation and modification

Administration Tracking:
- Record each medication administration with exact timestamp
- Capture administering staff member, route, and dose given
- Support documenting missed doses with reason codes
- Handle partial administrations and dose adjustments
- Track administration status (scheduled, given, missed, refused, held)

Reconciliation Features:
- Compare home medications with current orders
- Flag discrepancies between medication lists
- Support continuation, modification, or discontinuation of home medications
- Generate reconciliation reports for care transitions
- Maintain audit trail of reconciliation activities

Error Handling & Logging:
- Return clear error messages for validation failures
- Log all medication-related actions for compliance
- Handle concurrent modification scenarios
- Provide appropriate HTTP status codes for different error types

Testing Considerations:
- Test order creation with valid and invalid data
- Verify administration workflow from order to completion
- Test reconciliation scenarios across care transitions
- Validate authorization and access control
- Test edge cases: duplicate orders, overlapping schedules, discontinued medications
